analyzed: ma ha ka la stod tra/_bod skad du/_nag po chen po la bstod pa/_hum/
translated: Hūṃ.🔽You who bestow the ocean of bliss and joy,

analyzed: bde dga' rgya mtshho kun ster zhing /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gzhal med khang /_/

original: legs skyong nag po chen po ni/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chang khyod la bstod/_/
analyzed: legs skyong nag po chen po ni/_/'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chang khyod la bstod/_/
translated: I praise you, Mahakala, who wears a terrifying form.🔽Your body,🔽dark blue and majestic,🔽adorned with a garland of skeletons,🔽is seen as the night sky of Jambudvipa,

original: zla ba stong gis spras pa yi/_/mtshhan mo 'dzam gling nam mkha' ltar/_/khyod sku🔽mthing nag brjid pa la/_/keng rus phreng bas brgyan mthong nas/_/'jig

translated: adorned with a thousand moons.🔽The rākṣasas,🔽terrifying to the world,🔽are terrified at the sight of you.

original: rten 'jigs par byed pa yi/_/srin po rnams kyi snying rab 'gas/_/bdud
analyzed: rten 'jigs par byed pa yi/_/srin po rnams kyi snying rab 'gas/_/bdud
translated: The māras and the powerful ones🔽who lead astray drop their weapons

original: dang log 'dren dpa' bo rnams/_/mtshhon cha bor nas phyogs bcur bros/_/
analyzed: dang log 'dren dpa' bo rnams/_/mtshhon cha bor nas phyogs bcur bros/_/
translated: and flee in the ten directions.🔽Your feet are adorned with coiled snakes,

original: sbrul gyi chun pos bkris pa'i zhabs/_/drag po'i gom stabs bskyod pa ni/
analyzed: sbrul gyi chun pos bkris pa'i zhabs/_/drag po'i gom stabs bskyod pa ni/

original: stong gsum rlung gis 'tshhub pa yi/_/mtshho rlabs bzhin du rab tu g.yo/_/lhun
analyzed: stong gsum rlung gis 'tshhub pa yi/_/mtshho rlabs bzhin du rab tu g.yo/_/lhun
translated: like the waves of an ocean stirred by the wind.🔽The mountains, as if in terror, flee

original: po 'jigs pas bros pa dag_/bskyod par ma nus bzhin du 'dir/_/rgya mtshho
analyzed: po 'jigs pas bros pa dag_/bskyod par ma nus bzhin du 'dir/_/rgya mtshho
translated: but are unable to move from their places.

original: nag po chen po la bstod pa
analyzed: nag po chen po la bstod pa
translated: The great black ocean🔽is as if fleeing to the sky,

original: gnam du 'bros pa ltar/_/dog pa nyid las ring du 'phags/_/nags tshhal me
analyzed: gnam du 'bros pa ltar/_/dog pa nyid las ring du 'phags/_/nags tshhal me
translated: and so is far removed from its former depth.🔽The trees in the forest, with their flowers,

original: tog bcas pa'i shing /_/yib par 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyel/_/'brug stong sgra
analyzed: tog bcas pa'i shing /_/yib par 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyel/_/'brug stong sgra
translated: fall down as if they wanted to hide.🔽The laughter of the fierce one, the creator,🔽is like the sound of a thousand dragons roaring,

original: yang sgra min ltar/_/byed po'i gtum sgra gad mo dag_/stong gsum 'byung po'i
analyzed: yang sgra min ltar/_/byed po'i gtum sgra gad mo dag_/stong gsum 'byung po'i
translated: and the hosts of spirits in the three-thousandfold world system🔽listen to it with their ears and are terrified.

original: tshhogs rnams kyis/_/rna bar nyan cing stongs par byed/_/kun nas zhi thugs🔽spros bral yang /_/bstan pa bsrung dang bdag gi don/_/bsgrub phyir dam
analyzed: tshhogs rnams kyis/_/rna bar nyan cing stongs par byed/_/kun nas zhi thugs spros bral yang /_/bstan pa bsrung dang bdag gi don/_/bsgrub phyir dam
translated: Although your mind is completely peaceful🔽and free from conceptual elaboration,🔽you do not forget your vow🔽to protect the teachings and accomplish my goals.

original: bca' ma bsnyel bar/_/rngam 'khrug gtum pas thugs bskyed la/_/bdud
analyzed: bca' ma bsnyel bar/_/rngam 'khrug gtum pas thugs bskyed la/_/bdud
translated: With a fierce, wrathful, and terrifying attitude,🔽you cut and tear the hearts and blood🔽of demons and obstructors.

original: dang bgegs kyi snying khrag sha_/chem chem gcod byed srin po yi/_/gzugs
analyzed: dang bgegs kyi snying khrag sha_/chem chem gcod byed srin po yi/_/gzugs

analyzed: 'chang bka' stod pho nya gying /_/'dir gshegs drag po'i phrin las bsgrubs/_/

analyzed: zhes pas bstod pa bya/_pan+di ta spyan chen pos dur khrod bsil ba'i tshhal du bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
